okay so i basically wanted to make neuro sama at home semi-real time ability to 

1) hold conversations 

2) search the internet 

3) do stuff on my pc, like it has its own vm which is a docker inside of my pc 

so basically https://github.com/NyarchLinux/NyarchAssistant  with input video support and a persistent memory

okay here's my idea (on a pi/laptop/edge device)  

camera -> cv face detection / post est -> person's face as keyframe  

mic -> whisper -> store audio (or just offload audio to backend if it's too heavy)  

store in a video db  

(on backend, my pc)  

VLM (lightweight if you want realtime, idk qwen3 30b seems to be fine on llama cpp tho)  

input: current frame, current convo diagolue, past convos in database  

output : reply and gestures -> used to control a live2d model (waifu assistant yes)  

how realistic is this i have a 3090 on pc with 64 gb ram and ryzen 7700 and a pi/laptop to use as edge

laptop is actually beefy ahh (apart from broken camera, it has 48gb ram and 4060)  will probably find an open live2d model for now and commission someone later

semi-real time
ability to
1) hold conversations
2) search the internet
3) do stuff on my pc, like it has its own vm which is a docker inside of my pc
so basically https://github.com/NyarchLinux/NyarchAssistant 

okay here's my idea (on a pi/laptop/edge device) 
camera -> cv face detection / post est -> person's face as keyframe 
mic -> whisper -> store audio (or just offload audio to backend if it's too heavy) 
store in a video db 

(on backend, either my pc or your supercomputer)

output : reply and gesture -> used to control a live2d model (waifu assistant yes)
